opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Department of Justice, Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms, and Explosives v. City of Chicago, Illinois

opinion:
537 U.S. 1229

DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE, BUREAU OF ALCOHOL, TOBACCO, FIREARMS, AND EXPLOSIVES
v.
CITY OF CHICAGO, ILLINOIS.

No. 02-322.

Supreme Court of United States.

February 26, 2003.

1

CERTIORARI TO THE UNITED STATES COURT OF APPEALS FOR THE SEVENTH CIRCUIT.

2

C. A. 7th Cir. [Certiorari granted sub nom. Department of Treasury, Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco and Firearms v. Chicago, ante, p. 1018.] Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the Court of Appeals to consider what effect, if any, Div. J, Tit. 6, § 644, of the Consolidated Appropriations Resolution, 2003, Pub. L. 108-7, 117 Stat. 473, has on this case.
